task.title: Choosing your Generic Container
task.shortdesc: HTML has two types of generic containers: an inline generic container (SPAN) and a block-level generic container (DIV). The generic container you choose will depend on the type of information you want to contain.

taskbody.prereq:
In order to choose your generic container, you will need the following:
Text editor
HTML document
Text selection you would like to "contain"
